rows.label: fev03_120_125_msg0001
rows.name:
He told us to follow him, but now
he's completely disappeared...

rows.label: fev03_120_125_msg0004
rows.name:
Why don't we look for him
while we explore the village?

rows.label: fev03_120_125_msg0005
rows.name:
Good idea. We're not familiar
with this place yet anyway.

rows.label: fev03_120_125_msg0006
rows.name:
Besides, didn't he say
to come prepared?

rows.label: fev03_120_125_msg0007
rows.name:
He did say something
arbitrary like that...

rows.label: fev03_120_125_msg0008
rows.name:
There seem to be shops too, so
let's search for Vandham-san while
getting our equipment ready.
